name: Bushland Savescum
description:
Are you a real gamer? Yeah I don't think so!

I bet you save the game every ten seconds!

We'll see how u like it when the game autosaves constantly, even if you're in a bad spot. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!1!1!

Slash and walljump your way through the Australian outback to kill the sneaky wizard who cursed your save file. It's quite challanging, but the game saves often so it shouldn't be that bad. >:)

--------

Credits: 

LANIK2000 - Programming, Level Design

Michal_Atlas - Intern, Additional programming and art

jandourek - Art, Music, SFX

--------

Controls:

AD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

G - Attack

R - Reload save
